content:
From breakfast on The Terrace, with its captivating city views rivaling rooftop restaurants in New York, to afternoon libations in The Den, where our modern speakeasy-style cocktail hour unfolds, it is little moments of sophisticated indulgence that elevate the everyday at WestHouse Hotel New York. Hotel Residents enjoy these complimentary culinary privileges throughout their stay, a rare and exceptional offering among luxury hotels in New York. And with an enviable location in the very heart of the world’s most food-centric city, WestHouse Hotel New York Residents can gain coveted reservations at famed Manhattan restaurants.

Resident dining privileges include:

Sweet and Savory breakfast presentations and barista coffees in The Terrace

  • Weekdays between 6.30am and 10.30am
  • Weekends between 7.00am and 11.00am

Afternoon treats in The Terrace

  • Daily between 2.00pm and 4.00pm

Light fare and a curated selection of alcoholic* beverages served during Hours of Indulgence in The Den

  • Daily between 5.00pm and 8.00pm

Self-service non-alcoholic beverages in The Terrace

  • Daily between 6.30am and until 11.00pm

*WestHouse Hotel New York pours the finest quality spirits such as Hudson Whiskey, Manhattan Rye, Louis the 13th Cognac, Johnny Walker Blue, McAllen 18, Roca Patron, and more. Featured Champagnes include Perrier Jouet, Dom Perignon or Roederer Cristal.
